document.full_text: commissioner gary bettman believes the nhl will adopt a more balanced schedule when the relocated winnipeg franchise likely moves to the western conference in 2012.
document.title: n.h.l. commissioner bettman expects 2012 realignment
lines_and_colors: commissioner gary bettman believes the nhl will adopt a more balanced schedule when the relocated winnipeg franchise likely moves to the western conference in 2012.
